flawed_nl_solution:
There are 30+7+13=<<30+7+13=50>>50 pieces of bread after the first duck ate
The first duck ate half of all bread so 50*2=<<50*2=1000>>1000 pieces of bread were thrown in the pond

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 100, not 1000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
